3 #include "KMessage.h"
4 #include "KTextFile.h"

6 #include "KCommandLineTokenizer.hh"
7 #include "KXMLTokenizer.hh"
8 #include "KVariableProcessor.hh"
9 #include "KIncludeProcessor.hh"
10 #include "KLoopProcessor.hh"
11 #include "KConditionProcessor.hh"
12 #include "KPrintProcessor.hh"

14 #include "KTagProcessor.hh"
15 
16 #ifdef Kassiopeia_USE_ROOT
17 #include "KFormulaProcessor.hh"
18 #endif
19 
20 #include "KSMainMessage.h"
21 #include "KToolbox.h"
22 
23 using namespace Kassiopeia;
24 using namespace katrin;
25 
26 int main( int argc, char** argv )
27 {
28  if( argc == 1 )
29  {
30  cout << "usage: ./Kassiopeia <config_file_one.xml> [<config_file_one.xml> <...>] [ -r variable1=value1 variable2=value ... ]" << endl;
31  exit( -1 );
32  }
33 
34  KCommandLineTokenizer tCommandLine;
35  tCommandLine.ProcessCommandLine( argc, argv );
36 
37  KXMLTokenizer tTokenizer;
38  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor( tCommandLine.GetVariables() );
39  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
40  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
41  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
42  KPrintProcessor tPrintProcessor;
43  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
44  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
45 
46  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTokenizer );
47  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
48 
49 #ifdef Kassiopeia_USE_ROOT
50  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
51  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
52  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
53 #endif
54 
55  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
56  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
57  tPrintProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
58  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tPrintProcessor );
59 
60  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
61 
62  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "starting..." << eom;
63 
64  KToolbox::GetInstance();
65 
66  KTextFile* tFile;
67  for( auto tFilename : tCommandLine.GetFiles() )
68  {
69  tFile = new KTextFile();
70  tFile->AddToNames( tFilename );
71  tTokenizer.ProcessFile( tFile );
72  delete tFile;
73  }
74 /*
75  KSRoot* tRoot = KToolbox::GetInstance().GetAll<KSRoot>()[0];
76  for( auto sim : KToolbox::GetInstance().GetAll<KSSimulation>())
77  {
78  tRoot->Execute(sim);
79  }
80 */
81 
82  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "...finished" << eom;
83 
84  return 0;
85 }
